title: VERTICAL FARMING TOMATOES ON AN  AEROPONIC TOWER #hangingtomatoes #tomatoes

tasks.task: Setting up and maintaining an aeroponic tower garden for growing Sakura tomatoes.
subtasks: Assembling the aeroponic tower garden.

Monitoring and adjusting the pH and nutrient concentrations.
Regularly checking the moisture levels in the tower.
Pruning the plants to promote healthy growth.
Managing pests and diseases in the aeroponic system.
Transferring plants to larger stages as they grow.
Harvesting the mature tomatoes when they reach full maturity.
Continuously harvesting tomatoes for an extended period after maturity.

tasks.task: Planting and initial setup of tomato plants.
subtasks: Transferring young tomato seedlings into the aeroponic system.

tasks.task: Maintaining the aeroponic tower garden for the growth period.
subtasks: Monitoring and adjusting the nutrient levels as needed.
Checking and recalibrating the pH of the solution.
Regularly checking the moisture levels in the roots.
Pruning the tomato plants to promote health and yield.

Inspecting for pests and diseases and taking action if present.

tasks.task: Transferring plants to larger stages as they grow.
subtasks: Assessing when the plants have outgrown their current stage.
Preparing the next stage in the tower with new root support.
Transferring the plants to the next stage and reattaching to the misting system.

tasks.task: Harvesting and maintaining the harvest.
subtasks: Identifying when the tomatoes are ripe.
Safely harvesting the tomatoes without damaging the plant.
Continuing to monitor the plants and system for subsequent harvests.
